item.title: Mystery Behind Newly Married Land Surveyor In Gadwal Solved; Police Suspecting Wife’s Role
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: The mystery behind the murder of a newly-married licensed land surveyor in Gadwal district after he went missing on June 17 was resolved by the police with the detention of his wife and mother-in-law in connection with the case.
The 32-year-old surveyor Tejeswar, a resident of Gadwal, was married to Aishwarya hailing from Kurnool district on May 18. However, Tejeswar went missing on June 17. Based on his brother’s complaint, the police booked a missing case.
Even as they were search...]]>
item.author: M Srinivas, About The Author
